DOC.brief_summary: To assess efficacy term overall survival AZD6244 combination dacarbazine , compare dacarbazine alone , first line patient BRAF mutation positive advance cutaneous unknown primary melanoma
DOC.brief_title: Comparison AZD6244 Combination With Dacarbazine Versus ( v ) Dacarbazine Alone BRAF Mutation Positive Melanoma Patients
DOC.criteria: Histological cytological confirmation advance ( inoperable stage III stage IV ) cutaneous unknown primary melanoma Tumor sample confirm BRAF mutation positive Diagnosis uveal mucosal melanoma Any prior Investigational therapy comprise inhibitor Ras , Raf MEK Having receive investigational drug within 30 day start treatment , recover side effect investigational drug
